FuncDef: The display lacp brief command displays brief Link Aggregation Control Protocol (LACP) information, including the LACP system priority and system ID. The display lacp brief command displays brief Link Aggregation Control Protocol (LACP) information, including the LACP system priority and system ID.
ExtraInfo: LACP system priorities or IDs determine which Eth-Trunk interface in static LACP mode at either end of an Eth-Trunk link can function as the Actor.
